tutorials <-  yaml::yaml.load_file("../metadata/tutorials.yaml")

 fluidRow(
   column(width = 10,
      h1("Tutorials", class = "header-with-tab"),
      do.call(tabBox, c(
        width = 10,
        purrr::map(
          tutorials, ~ tabPanel(.$title, includeRmd(paste0("../tutorials/", .$id, ".Rmd")), value = .$id)
          ))
        )
        )
 )
